description: Cluster-wide commands to assign roles to nodes, remove role assignments, or add, edit or remove a cluster-wide property.

add-role.description: Assign a specific role to a node in the cluster.

role.description: The name of the role. The only supported role is 'overseer'.

node.description: The name of the node. It is possible to assign a role even before that node is started.

remove-role.description: Unassign a role from a node in the cluster.

role.description: The name of the role. The only supported role as of now is 'overseer'.

node.description: The name of the node where the role should be removed.

set-property.description: Add, edit, or delete a cluster-wide property.

val.description: The value of the property. If the value is empty or null, the property is unset.
